task.title: Including Dynamic Content in an SVG
task.shortdesc: lets you create dynamic graphical content by including referenced content in vector graphics. The script svg-simple-test.xsl generates an SVG graphic of a box with static dimensions and inserts the title of the DITA topic where the is placed in.

li.p: Your DITA topic has a title, for example:

context.p: To include dynamic content in an SVG, complete the following step:

step.cmd: Insert <fig xcr:xsl="svg-simple-test.xsl"/> at the position in your topic body where you want the dynamic graphical content to appear.

result.p: A preview of the static box filled with the title of your DITA topic is automatically displayed in Author mode:
The referenced text is inserted centered with constant text size. Automatic line wrapping or scaling is not supported yet.
